long_description: The REI Rib-Knit arm warmers with cable-knit accents give you a stylish way to add warmth to your casual winter outfits. Blend of lambswool and nylon is soft and warm; wool insulates efficiently and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in wide-ranging conditions. Arm warmers can be layered under long sleeves or tucked under short sleeves; thumb loops help the arm warmers cover the backs of your hands.
short_description: The REI Rib-Knit arm warmers with cable-knit accents give you a stylish way to add warmth to your casual winter outfits.
